product_description: Children love their superheroes and nothing excites a kid more than pretending to fly through the air like Superhero. Kids can also unleash their creativity and imagination by drawing, printing, or customizing the capes however they like. These capes make excellent gifts for kids to cosplay in Birthday Party, Halloween Dress Up Costume, Christmas Party, Costume Party, Team Spirit Building, Vacation Bible School, Role Pretend Play, 100th day of school celebration, Festivals, Themed Party Costumes, Career Themed Party, Everyday Play, and so on. With a variety of superhero designs to choose from, kids can play a different superhero every day of the week. These capes stimulate imagination and creativity, allowing kids to explore new worlds and have fun with their friends. Our Superhero Capes and Masks are the ideal presents and perfect party favors for kids, great for birthday goodie bags, incentives for students, and ornaments for parties. For the best look, all capes should be ironed on low heat before use and hand washed in cold water and air dried. Masks can be wiped clean with a damp towel. short_description: 60% Polyester, 40% Plastic

OFFICIALLY LICENSED: DC Comics Batman
IMPORTANT DETAILS: Child's Batman cape and mask set has a plastic half mask with elastic in the back and a cape with hook and loop closure at the neck

EVERY DAY IS AN OCCASION: Great for Halloween, themed parties, or cosplay events. Life is more fun in costume. COSTUME DESTINATION: Rubies aims to spark joy and creativity as your go-to destination for expertly crafted costumes & accessories.
product_description: Let your young hero gear up with the DC Batman Child’s Cape and Mask Set by Rubies! This officially licensed set includes a sleek black cape with a hook-and-loop neck closure and a molded plastic half mask with an elastic strap for comfort. Inspired by Batman’s iconic look, it instantly transforms your child into Gotham’s protector—no full costume needed! Perfect for Halloween, playdates, or everyday dress-up, this set sparks big imagination with bold style. Whether saving the day or patrolling the backyard, your little Dark Knight is ready for action—because every hero starts with a cape and a dream! Since 1951, Rubies has been a trusted name in fun, offering safety-tested costumes, wigs, masks, and accessories for kids, adults, pets, and décor. Now part of a global family of brands, Rubies delivers both licensed and original styles designed with quality, comfort, and creativity in mind. From Halloween to everyday play, our wide assortment helps bring imagination to life with on-trend looks and iconic characters. With over 70 years of experience, Rubies continues to inspire unforgettable moments for the whole family—year-round.
